WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed this, only the crit rating will show up for non physical classes.
WorkItem.Description: I just noticed that the Meteorite Whetstone shows up as having 111 haste rating (tried reloading from Armory and Wowhead to make sure it wasn't just in my cache like that). That can't possibly be right, can it? With 444 haste rating on proc, a 10 second duration, and a 45 second internal cooldown, even the absolute best case should only be 98.66.

Comments.Message: I have to manually edit this item to not have haste since it's shown as have haste ALL the time.  In fact, this item is a non-caster item and only works for melee/ranged attacks.  This need to be fixed to be a proc w/cooldown & duration.
